Trade/Device Name(s): BD Veritor System Flu A + B assay Clinical kit
BD Veritor System for Rapid Detection of Flu A + B
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BD Veritor System Flu A + B assay clinical kit using chromatographic immunoassay for qualitative detection of influenza A and B antigens in respiratory specimens.
Indications for Use Summary: Rapid chromatographic immunoassay for direct and qualitative detection of influenza A and B viral nucleoprotein antigens from nasopharyngeal wash, aspirate and swab samples from symptomatic patients, distinguishing influenza A from B, as an aid in diagnosis.
